meanings: [명사] permission, (formal) leave; (공식적) sanction, authorization; (입학·입장 등의) admission; (승인) approval; (면허) license, [동사] permit, (formal) grant, (formal) sanction, authorize; (입학·입장) admit; (승인하다) approve (of); (면허를 주다) license

examples.korean: She needed a special dispensation to remarry. 발음듣기 그녀는 재혼을 하려면 특별 허가가 필요했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
